author: Special Correspondent
text:
Communist Party of India (CPI) national secretary K. Narayana on Monday said People’s Welfare Front led by his party in Puducherry would formally announce its electoral alliance on February 6.

He was here participating at CPI State executive committee meeting which analysed the political situations and formation alliance in view of forthcoming alliances. Later talking to reporters here, Dr. Narayana said his party joined together with CPI-M, DMDK, VCK and Revolutionary Socialist Party under the banner of People’s Welfare Front (PWF) has been organising several struggles against the ruling governments at Centre and State. The PWF will announce its common minimum programme and the schedule of campaign on February 6, he said.

“Our object is to come to power and bring about the change the people expect in Puducherry. We want to defeat communal forces and people like the Chief Minister who aligned with the communal BJP,” said Dr. Narayana.
title: PWF will announce electoral alliance on Feb. 6, says CPI secretary
